text: 58|12|nampikkaiyalarkale! Ninkal nam tutarutan irakaciyam peca virumpinal, unkal irakaciyattirku munnatakave (elaikalukku) etum tanam ceytu vitunkal. Itu unkalukku nanmaiyum paricuttat tanmaiyum akum. (Tanam kotuppatarku etaiyum) ninkal ataintira vittal, (ataipparri unkal mitu kurramillai.) Niccayamaka allah mika mannippavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan avan
